svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

height="30" width="470" x="414" y="-10" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="3y2dNiOmcEcrZG0tFU__-15" parent="1" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;shape=mxgraph.basic.document;fontSize=18;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="670" width="480" x="414" y="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="3y2dNiOmcEcrZG0tFU__-16" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=18;fontColor=#000000;" value="<div style="line-height: 200%;">import { gql } from "@apollo/client";</div><div style="line-height: 200%;">const QUERY = gql`</div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	query GetItems {</span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	getItemById {</span></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	<b>...</b></span></span></span><b style="white-space: pre;">combinedFields</b></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</span><br></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	getRecommendItem {</span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span></span></span></span><span style="white-space: pre;"><b>...</b></span><b style="white-space: pre;">combinedFields</b></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">}</span><br></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</span><br></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	<b>fragment combinedFields on Item &amp; User {</b></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><b><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	id</span><br></b></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><b><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>code</span></b></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><b><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	price</span><br></span></b></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><b><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	name</span><br></b></span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><b><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	age</span><br></b></span></span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><b><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</b></span><br></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;">`;</div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="650.5" width="386" x="444" y="29.5" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="3y2dNiOmcEcrZG0tFU__-28" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=42;fontStyle=1" value="Fragment" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="50" width="200" style="shape=mxgraph.mockup.markup.redX;fillColor=#ff0000;html=1;shadow=0;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="40" width="40" x="854" y="390" as="geometry" /> id="3y2dNiOmcEcrZG0tFU__-39" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=18;fontStyle=1" value="サーバーのスキーマ定義" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="470" x="160" y="-10" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="3y2dNiOmcEcrZG0tFU__-40" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=18;fontColor=#000000;" value="<div style="line-height: 200%;">type Item {</div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	id</span><br></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	code</span><br></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	price</span><br></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;">}</div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><br></div><div style="line-height: 200%;">type User {</div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	id</span><br></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	name</span><br></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	age</span><br></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;">}</div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><br></div><div style="line-height: 200%;">type Query {</div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	#省略</span><br></div><div style="line-height: 200%;">}</div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="550.5" width="170" x="180" y="29.75" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 468px; height: 1px; padding-top: 185px; margin-left: 291px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
